_sText:
Hi, this is a simple Barnacle prefab I made for CS:S in my free time, took me 3 days. (Experimenting with the buggy trigger_push and AddOutput + BaseVelocity until I figured the teleport way)
Tested with: CS:S (Probably works in the Multiplayer too)

--------------------
How does it work?

1. A player walks to the Barnacle's tongue (trigger_once)

2. The trigger_once activates the trigger_teleport Brush (since trigger_push didn't
work and AddOutput + BaseVelocity was buggy) and plays some sounds, performs animations, activates a game_ui, and also assigns a targetname (p_barnacle_player) to the Barnacle'd player.

3. A player now has 1 or 2 seconds to react before they're eaten (delayed trigger_hurt, 75 damage).

4. Once the player has been killed, the Barnacle plays "Digesting" Sounds and Animations, and is "full" (doesn't eat other players) until the next round.
5. or the Barnacle can be killed anytime even when it's consuming a Player.

--------------------
Installation: Extract the .vmf file to your Prefabs folder and only use it with the "Insert Prefab" key in Hammer.
(You can use multiple Barnacles in 1 map without renaming any entities/outputs, that's why it should be only inserted with "Insert Prefab".)

-- NOTICE --
Your room's height must be at least 168 units tall or more, or the Prefab might bug out.
By default, the Barnacle is scripted to only eat Clients (Players) and not the bots, you can change it in the trigger_once, trigger_teleport and trigger_hurt Flags.

Happy mapping! :)
